Detailed Description

Create a single Trivial_Supplier_Filter.

This Factory creates a single Trivial_Supplier_Filter that is used by all the suppliers (i.e. ProxyConsumers) of an event channel.

Member Function Documentation

TAO_EC_Supplier_Filter * TAO_EC_Trivial_Supplier_Filter_Builder::create (  RtecEventChannelAdmin::SupplierQOS &    qos )  [virtual]
 

Create the filter. The <consumer> is bound to the returned Supplier_Filter, it must be <unbound> upon destruction and/or disconnection.

Reimplemented from TAO_EC_Supplier_Filter_Builder.
